about_the_game:
Keyclash is an innovative mix of classic tower defense games and roguelike strategy, all set on the keys of a keyboard. Build powerful turrets, unlock upgrades, and survive against endless waves of enemies in this tower defense hybrid. With each run, adapt to randomized challenges, experiment with powerful combinations, and try to reach wave 100.

Keyboard-Centric Gameplay

Use the physical keyboard to unlock keys as buildable spaces for turrets. Strategically expand your defenses on the keyboard grid.

Incremental Roguelike Upgrades

Build your defense every wave with scalable level-focused upgrades like increased attack speed, damage multipliers, critical strike chances, and elemental ability enhancements. Perfect your strategy as you grow stronger with each run.

Overpowered Meta Perks

Unlock limited game-changing perks can completely break the game, such as faster resource gain, automatic repairs, or turret invincibility. Customize your approach with these powerful tools to shape the ultimate defense.

Challenging Enemy Waves

Face a variety of enemies with unique resistances, patterns, and escalating difficulty. Each wave introduces fresh challenges that demand adaptive strategies.
